```{r}
df<-read.csv('/Users/chenfeng/Downloads/rain_dance_vs_cloud_seeding.csv')

mod1<- lm(rain_inches ~ cloud_seeding+rain_dance ,data=df)
mod2<- lm(rain_inches ~ rain_dance+cloud_seeding+rain_dance*cloud_seeding, data=df )

summary(mod1)
sss

plot(mod1)
summary(mod2)
plot(mod2)
summary(mod3)
```

```{r}
max_rain

summary(mod)
```
